metadata.Title: CVE-2019-9644 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.Description:
An XSSI (cross-site inclusion) vulnerability in Jupyter Notebook before5.7.6 allows inclusion of resources on malicious pages when visited byusers who are authenticated with a Jupyter server. Access to the content ofresources has been demonstrated with Internet Explorer through capturing oferror messages, though not reproduced with other browsers. This occursbecause Internet Explorer's error messages can include the content of anyinvalid JavaScript that was encountered.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-9644` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

jupyter-notebook - 5.7.8-1
python3-notebook - 5.7.8-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: jupyter-notebook package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.7.8-1').
